entry.title: New release for Ganymede: v4.2.0
entry.content:
[!IMPORTANT]
If you are running the :dev container image now is the best time to switch back to :latest or the semver version.

New Features

Translations

The web interface now supports i18n/translations. Currently supported languages are English and German. If you would like to add a translation or update strings see the README for more information. A new language button is present on the navbar for switching languages.

Additionally two new environment variables have been added to control the language.

  • SHOW_LOCALE_BUTTON: true/false Show the locale/language button on the navbar (defaults to true).
  • DEFAULT_LOCALE: Sets the default locale/language. Must be the short code of the language. Example: en for English, de for German.

For this update I primarily focused on strings. If you notice anything else that should be localized such as dates, times, or missed strings open a pull request or issue.

Better Quality Selection

Streams and VODs often come with multiple quality options like 720p, 720p60, 1080p, 1080p60, and so on, which can become tedious to manage. To simplify this, the web interface now displays only the resolution (e.g., 1080p) for each quality option. When archiving a video, the system checks the available quality options and selects the closest match to the user's chosen resolution. For instance, if a user selects "720p" and both "720p30" and "720p60" are available, "720p60" will be automatically selected. This only applies if the resolution is not "best" or "audio".

What's Changed

  • build(deps): bump next in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/687
  • feat: add category to live notification template variables by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/697
  • build(deps): bump github.com/jackc/pgx/v5 from 5.7.2 to 5.7.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/694
  • build(deps): bump github.com/rs/zerolog from 1.33.0 to 1.34.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/696
  • feat: select closest quality when archiving by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/700
  • fix(frontend/titlebar): update tooltip label format for streamed date and use timezone by @vicente-higino in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/708
  • build(deps): bump github.com/jackc/pgx/v5 from 5.7.3 to 5.7.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/704
  • build(deps): bump github.com/testcontainers/testcontainers-go/modules/postgres from 0.35.0 to 0.36.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/705
  • build(deps): bump github.com/go-playground/validator/v10 from 10.25.0 to 10.26.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/707
  • build(deps): bump axios from 1.8.1 to 1.8.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/710
  • ops: remove custom branch in test by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/711
  • Chat convert out of bounds by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/713
  • feat(frontend): i18n support by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/702
  • build(deps): bump github.com/riverqueue/river/riverdriver/riverpgxv5 from 0.19.0 to 0.20.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/715
  • build(deps): bump github.com/coreos/go-oidc/v3 from 3.13.0 to 3.14.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/716
  • build(deps): bump github.com/riverqueue/river from 0.19.0 to 0.20.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/718
  • build(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.36.0 to 0.37.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/719
  • build: bump go to 1.24 by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/721
  • Fix some typos by @CompileNix in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/723
  • Update and extend german frontend translations by @CompileNix in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/724
  • fix(tasks): remove fetching sprite thumbnails for twitch by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/726
  • feat(frontend): merge en strings with specified language by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/720
  • Extend german translations by @CompileNix in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/728

New Contributors

  • @CompileNix made their first contribution in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/723

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/compare/v4.1.0...v4.2.0

entry.title: New release for Ganymede: v4.3.0
entry.content:
[!IMPORTANT]
If you are running the :dev container image now is the best time to switch back to :latest or the semver version.

New Features

Bulk Video Actions

The Admin videos page now has a bulk actions button. This allows you to perform standard video operations against multiple videos at once. - https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/issues/727

The future plan is for most of these to be available in the non-admin page such as when viewing a channels videos.

Advanced Search

The search page now has more advanced features. You can search by specific video fields and chapters (categories). The syntax is field:query, example: chapter:World of Warcraft

If you have any suggestions or enhancements to the advanced search logic please open a feature request.

Live Stream Chapters (Categories)

Live streams archived through the watched channels functionality will now have chapters (categories) - https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/issues/690. Internally this works by checking if the category has changed since the last check for live channels occurred. This feature only works for live streams archived with the watched channels functionality. Archiving live streams manually will not have chapters (categories) populated.

What's Changed

  • fix(frontend): prevent wrapping long elements by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/730
  • feat(frontend): video bulk actions by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/735
  • build(deps): bump golang.org/x/net from 0.37.0 to 0.38.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/739
  • build(deps): bump golang.org/x/oauth2 from 0.28.0 to 0.29.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/734
  • build(deps): bump github.com/prometheus/client_golang from 1.21.1 to 1.22.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/733
  • build(deps): bump riverqueue.com/riverui from 0.8.1 to 0.9.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/732
  • build(deps): bump github.com/sethvargo/go-envconfig from 1.1.1 to 1.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/742
  • feat(vod): advanced search by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/736
  • feat(live): update chapters for live streams during live stream check by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/745
  • build(deps): bump github.com/testcontainers/testcontainers-go from 0.36.0 to 0.37.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/746
  • build(deps): bump github.com/testcontainers/testcontainers-go/modules/postgres from 0.36.0 to 0.37.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/747
  • Update README.md by @benwa in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/749
  • update issue templates by @benwa in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/750

New Contributors

  • @benwa made their first contribution in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/749

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/compare/v4.2.0...v4.3.0

entry.title: New release for Ganymede: v4.4.0
entry.content:
[!IMPORTANT]
If you are running the :dev container image now is the best time to switch back to :latest or the semver version.

New Features

Stream Metadata Updating (https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/issues/774)

Watched channels have a new setting that configures the number of minutes after the live stream archive starts to update the stream metadata. This includes updating thumbnails, info.json file, and the title. A task_update_live_stream_metadata task gets queued for X number of minutes in the future to perform these tasks.

What's Changed

  • build(deps): bump riverqueue.com/riverui from 0.9.0 to 0.10.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/768
  • The UI now has a filter!

  • build(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.37.0 to 0.38.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/770

  • build(deps): bump github.com/jackc/pgx/v5 from 5.7.4 to 5.7.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/769
  • build(deps): bump github.com/labstack/echo/v4 from 4.13.3 to 4.13.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/773
  • feat: update live stream metadata task by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/775 for https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/issues/774

Translations

```bash Translation coverage report for frontend/messages/*.json Missing translations: de: - AdminWatchedComponents.updateMetadataLabel - AdminWatchedComponents.updateMetadataDescription

Translation stats: de: 99.68% translated (620/622) with 2 missing translations and 0 extra translations ```

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/compare/v4.3.1...v4.4.0

entry.title: New release for Ganymede: v4.5.0
entry.content:
[!IMPORTANT]
If you are running the :dev container image now is the best time to switch back to :latest or the semver version.

New Features

Overview Page

https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/issues/796 - A new page (Admin > Overview) provides a high-level overview of your instance. This includes storage usage, videos by channel, storage usage by channel, and some other metrics.

Video size is now calculated after archive and presented in the title bar and admin panel. The task to calculate instance-wide usage is run nightly at 00:00. After upgrading you will need to run the task in Admin > Tasks if you do not want to wait.

Experimental

Better Live Stream Detection and Cleanup

https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/issues/760 - The Twitch API can be slow to update if a stream is live or goes offline. This can result in a second "phantom" archive being created after the live stream ends, because the Twitch API has not yet updated. A new experimental config option has been added to better detect if a channel is live and automatically clean up "phantom" archives. If you are experiencing this, try enabling the experimental config option. Also make sure your live stream check interval is not less than 30 seconds. See https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/issues/760 and https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/804 for details

What's Changed

  • Update german translations for changes from 1 PR by @CompileNix in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/778
  • fix(frontend/admin): accept timezone in streamed_at by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/779
  • feat(frontend): force login by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/780
  • force login fixes by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/781
  • build(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.38.0 to 0.39.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/783
  • build(deps): bump github.com/riverqueue/river/rivertype from 0.22.0 to 0.23.1 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/784
  • build(deps): bump github.com/riverqueue/river/riverdriver/riverpgxv5 from 0.22.0 to 0.23.1 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/785
  • build(deps): bump github.com/riverqueue/river from 0.22.0 to 0.23.1 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/786
  • build(deps): bump riverqueue.com/riverui from 0.10.0 to 0.11.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/787
  • Fix early return in Check() that skips other live channels by @goproslowyo in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/791
  • build(deps): bump github.com/go-jose/go-jose/v4 from 4.1.0 to 4.1.1 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/795
  • build(deps): bump next in /frontend by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/797
  • feat: storage usage and overview by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/798
  • feat: additional 'is live' check by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/793
  • build(deps): bump github.com/go-playground/validator/v10 from 10.26.0 to 10.27.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/801
  • fix(vod): use video hls path when deleting vods if hls video by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/803
  • fix: pin streamlink to 7.4.0 by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/805
  • Phantom live stream detection and removal by @Zibbp in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/804

New Contributors

  • @goproslowyo made their first contribution in https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/pull/791

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Zibbp/ganymede/compare/v4.4.0...v4.5.0
